variants.Description in input context: The c.897C>T variant in the TP53 gene results in a loss-of-function of the protein.

Readout description.Result Description: The proliferation rate of cells expressing the c.897C>T variant was significantly lower compared to wild-type cells.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each sample.

Technical replicates.Description: Each technical replicate was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cells were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: There was no mentioned of a negative control in this experiment.

Validation controls B/LB.Description: A known benign variant was included for validation.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Two-tailed t-test was used to compare the means of proliferation rates between wild-type and variant-expressing cells.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Proliferation rate greater than or equal to 80%.
